  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:colos_en/140360</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:colos_en/140360</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Kondenzator in dipol</string>
            <string language="en">Condenser and dipole</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kondensator und Dipol</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Condensateur et dipöle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Condensador e dipole</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Condensatore e dipolo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συμπυκνωτής και δίπολο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Condensador y dipolo</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">V polje ploščatega kondenzatorja postavimo dipol in opazujemo njegovo polarizacijo.</string>
            <string language="en">Dipole is placed in space between two plates of capacitor and due to the electric field of capacitor polarization of dipole occurs.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">kondenzator</string>
            <string language="en">capacitor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">dipol</string>
            <string language="en">dipole</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">polarizacija</string>
            <string language="en">polarization</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">colos</string>
            <string language="en">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">jacob</string>
            <string language="en">jacob</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dipol wird in Platz zwischen zwei Platten 
Kondensator gelegt und passend zum elektrischen fangen Sie 
von der Kondensatorpolarisation des Dipols auftritt auf.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le dipöle est placé dans l'espace entre deux 
plats de condensateur et en raison du champ électrique de la 
polarisation de condensateur du dipöle se produit.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O dipole é colocado em um espaço entre duas 
placas do capacitor e  devido ao campo elétrico do polarization do 
capacitor do dipole ocorre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il dipolo è disposto nello spazio fra due 
piastre del condensatore e dovuto il campo elettrico di polarizzazione
del condensatore del dipolo accade.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το δίπολο τοποθετείται στο διάστημα μεταξύ δύο 
πιάτων του πυκνωτή και λόγω στο ηλεκτρικό πεδίο του πυκνωτή η 
πόλωση του διπόλου εμφανίζεται.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El dipolo se coloca en espacio entre dos placas 
de condensador y  debido al campo eléctrico de la polarización del 
condensador del dipolo ocurre.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kondensator</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dipol</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Polarisation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">jacob</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">condensateur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">dipöle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">polarisation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">jacob</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">capacitor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">δίπολο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πόλωση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
